subject: Re: [junit] can i check a connection from junit ?
msgSnippet: Please search the web for JUnit FAQ and search the FAQ for VerifyError . I think you ll find the answer. (It s long and I don t want to retype it.) Thanks.
messageBody:
Please search the web for "JUnit FAQ" and search the FAQ for
"VerifyError". I think you'll find the answer. (It's long and I don't
want to retype it.)

Thanks.

*********** REPLY SEPARATOR ***********

On 2002-09-17 at 06:55 tedy_kiong wrote:

>hai,
>
>can i use Junit to test the connection ?,
>
>i test with Junit on JB6, and interclient 2.0
>
>i get error message like this :
>
>java.lang.VerifyError: (class: interbase/interclient/ErrorKey,
>method: _$372 signature: (Ljava/lang/String;Ljava/lang/String;I)V)
>Expecting to find unitialized object on stack
<snip />
